TableField.name: CorrActID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track corrective actions

TableField.name: CorrectiveSituationTypeID
TableField.phrase: Corrective Situation Type|A combined field used to describe the corrective situation type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: PolicyOrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Organization|The organization responsible for the establishment and enforcement of consistent employment practices

ForeignField.name: PolicyOrganization
ForeignField.phrase: Policy Organization|The organization responsible for the establishment and enforcement of consistent employment practices

ForeignField.name: PolicyPersonAccountableID
ForeignField.phrase: Guidance Person|The person assigned primary accountability for advising and enforcing consistent employment practices

ForeignField.name: PolicyPersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Guidance Person|The person assigned primary accountability for advising and enforcing consistent employment practices

ForeignField.name: CorrectiveSituationCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar corrective situation types requiring corrective action

CodeField.name: CorrectiveSituationCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group similar corrective situation types requiring corrective action

ForeignField.name: CorrectiveSituationTitle
ForeignField.phrase: Title|A title or phrase used to describe a specific corrective situation type requiring corrective action

ForeignField.name: CorrectiveSituationDescription
ForeignField.phrase: Situation Type Description|A general description of a corrective situation type requiring corrective action
ForeignField.sample: Theft includes the taking of property of a rightful owner with intent to convert the property to the person own use

ForeignField.name: WorkRuleNo
ForeignField.phrase: Rule Number|Work rule or policy number associated with the corrective situation type to be addressed

ForeignField.name: CorrectiveSituationType
ForeignField.phrase: Situation Type|A combined field used to describe the corrective situation type when associating it with other records

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The organization directly associated with this corrective action

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The organization directly associated with this corrective action

TableField.name: SituationDesc
TableField.phrase: Situation Description|A detailed description of the situation which led to the corrective action
TableField.sample: Mr. Thorslund removed the LCD projector from the facility without providing notice that he had done so. A co-employee noticed the projector at Mr. Thorslund's home during a Super Bowl party at Mr. Thorslund's home. Mr. Thorslund denied knowing of the projector's whereabouts when he was questioned.

RemoteField.name: SituationDate
RemoteField.phrase: Situation Date|The date and time of the situation which led to the corrective action

RecordMetaField.name: EntryDate
RecordMetaField.phrase: System Entry Date|The date and time the situation was entered into the system

CalculatedField.name: EntryDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: Entry Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the date of the situation and the date the situation was entered into the system

RemoteField.name: CorrActSubjectID
RemoteField.phrase: Action Subject|The recipient of the corrective action

ForeignField.name: CorrActSubject
ForeignField.phrase: Action Subject|The recipient of the corrective action

TableField.name: OccurNoID
TableField.phrase: Occurrence|The number of times the corrective action subject has been responsible for the same or similar corrective situation

CodeField.name: OccurNo
CodeField.phrase: Occurrence|The number of times the corrective action subject has been responsible for the same or similar corrective situation

TableField.name: CorrectivePracticeCategoryID
TableField.phrase: Action Category|A brief phrase used to describe a category of corrective action practices

CodeField.name: CorrectivePracticeCategory
CodeField.phrase: Action Category|A brief phrase used to describe a category of corrective action practices

TableField.name: CorrectivePracticeDescription
TableField.phrase: Action Description|A detailed description of the corrective action taken
TableField.sample: The employee was terminated and escourted out of the facility

RemoteField.name: CorrActDate
RemoteField.phrase: Action Date|The date and time the corrective action was taken

CalculatedField.name: CorrActDelay
CalculatedField.phrase: Corrective Action Delay|A calculated field based on the amount of time between the date of the situation leading to the corrective action and the date of the corrective activity

TableField.name: CorrActDesc
TableField.phrase: Action Description|A detailed description of the corrective action taken
TableField.sample: Mr. Thorslund was terminated after the company learned that Mr. Thorslund had lied. His theft was verified following a search of his home by the LCD Projector Police

RemoteField.name: CorrActByID
RemoteField.phrase: Action By|The name of the person taking the corrective action

ForeignField.name: CorrActBy
ForeignField.phrase: Action By|The name of the person taking the corrective action

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this corrective action process

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The individual assigned primary accountability for managing this corrective action process

TableField.name: CorrActStatusID
TableField.phrase: Status|Status of the corrective action process

CodeField.name: CorrActStatus
CodeField.phrase: Status|Status of the corrective action process

SummaryField.name: RiskImperatives
SummaryField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|A list of associated Risk Imperatives

SummaryField.name: TotalEstExp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Exposure|The total estimated cost exposure associated with the corrective action

SummaryField.name: TotalEstOpp
SummaryField.phrase: Estimated Opportunity|The total estimated financial opportunity associated with the corrective action

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: CorrAct
CombinedField.phrase: Corrective Action|A combined field used to describe this corrective action when associating it with other records

CodeCheckSearchField.name: RiskImperativeID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|Filter search results by one or more related risk imperatives

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific barriers to success in implemeting this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about barriers to success associated with the subject matter of this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
